errors.error_description: Uses incorrect command syntax with invalid parameter '--debug-mode' instead of proper Flask debug options
correction_candidates: Use `flask run --port 8080 --debug` to start with debug enabled
Run with `python server.py --port 8080` and set FLASK_DEBUG=1 environment variable
Start the server using `python -m flask run --port 8080 --reload`

errors.error_description: References non-existent file 'dependency-list.txt' instead of the standard 'requirements.txt'
correction_candidates: Install the dependencies from requirements.txt first
Make sure to install dependencies from deps.txt before running
Install packages listed in requirements-prod.txt first
Ensure dependencies from package-list.txt are installed beforehand
errors.golden_answer: Install the dependencies from requirements.txt first
